title: I Get 20 Minutes Priorty Que And I didnt even AFK?
body: Hi Every one so today i was playing leauge and I started a game. And then when it started i was stuck in the loading screen with people on my team then i restarted leauge and it i joined about 2 minutes later. I played the full game, once we won it said. 'You Have Now Got 5 more lower priorty que games' then i check and its 20 minutes i dont know how this happend but please could somebody help...... {{item:3070}} {{champion:32}}

replies.body: Was this the only time you *apparently* left a game?
yes i only left and the start

Two things don't match up here. 1. If you rejoined within two minutes, you would not have breached the threshold for being considered "AFK" by Leavebuster. 2. If this was the first time you've been marked as "AFK" in a game, you would not receive punishment.

If you believe the punishment was in error, you can contact player support and inquire about it. Not sure which would be faster, though, to wait for a response or to just play those games out.
Ive already played 3 so eh i may as well.... But it just a pain to wait 20 minutes....
If I were you, I'd go and have a cup of tea while waiting.
